name: The Train (itch) (WEREstheWOLF)
description:
This is a Horror themed VR Experience I made for a class.

This expereince is best played with headphones.

Download for both VR and Desktop Versions: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1wUo9_OzmXbmbiAPqIWsvP-F-7Q1PCTNO

If and when I get a working HTML version, it will be uploaded here to play.

Made in Unity 2021.3.1f1

Extension Assets used:
Train Controller (Railroad System) ULTIMATE COLLECTION
Broccoli Tree Creator

Music:
Long Note Two Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
